EmailTemplate.description: Email notification sent to internal user when their pre-book has been approved by the dealer
EmailTemplate.name: Pre Book Approved HTML
EmailTemplate.subject: Pre-Book {!Opportunity.Name} has been approved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName},
The pre-book you submitted for approval has been approved by the dealer.
{!Opportunity.Link}
Thanks!
